dmca.title: [EV1-C2022435B] Abuse report IP: 207.218.208.7 / http://www.spyderclan.net
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not

Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

Legal Response Team

 (multipart/alternative)
MIME element (text/plain)
To whom it may concern, 
 
 
The webspace hosted at http://www.spyderclan.net contains audio and
software 
material which is infringing copyright laws and the acceptable use
policy of 
your company. 
 
As the IP address: 207.218.208.7 at which the domain name 
http://www.spyderclan.net points to is registered at EV1SERVERS, I
therefore 
let you know. 
 
The following links are: 
 
http://www.spyderclan.net/007sCrap/Files/NOLF/Mods/NoDisk.zip - This
seems 
to be a CD authentication bypass crack for a specific game. 
 
 
http://www.spyderclan.net/007sCrap/Indie/ - This directory seems to
contain 
tracks and albums which contain copyrights. 
 
I hope I informed you well enough and I also hope that your company will

take the necessary actions. 
 
Regards, 
 
John Selman.
